mapper.sql: room_id, area_id, building_id, type, introduct, totalNum, currentNum, isFiled, room_sn
mapper.select:
select r.room_id, r.area_id, r.building_id, r.type, r.introduct, r.totalNum, r.currentNum, r.isFiled, r.room_sn,a.area_name,b.building_name,b.manager_name from tab_room r,tab_area a,tab_building b where r.building_id = b.building_id and b.area_id = a.id
and room_sn like CONCAT('%',#{roomSn},'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into tab_room
room_id,
area_id,
building_id,
type,
introduct,
totalNum,
currentNum,
isFiled,
room_sn,
#{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{introduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{currentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isfiled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{roomSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update tab_room
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduct = #{introduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
totalNum = #{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
currentNum = #{currentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isFiled = #{isfiled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_sn = #{roomSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tab_room set area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, building_id = #{buildingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduct = #{introduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, totalNum = #{totalnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, currentNum = #{currentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isFiled = #{isfiled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_sn = #{roomSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
